Summary: UFO was traveling North to South over Jasper, Georgia
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile standing on the front porch my son(Michael) and his girlfriend(Stephanie) saw movement in the sky, at which point they called me to see it and what I saw was: At arms length the object was about 2 fingers wide and it was traveling at a slow to moderate rate of speed.. The object had a transparant glow to it which had about 8 lights on it that were very dim. It looked like a boomerang and was traveling north to south. My son saw it at about 12:00 in the sky and he said it was much larger (about 4-5 fingers wide at arms length). I saw it at about 2:00 in the sky and it was about 2 fingers wide. We watched it until it dissappeared near Ballground, Georgia. It made no sound at all.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Jasper
There were no other sightings in Jasper on or around October 14th 2010
